response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to substantial growth. Given its exceptional capabilities and the value it can bring to your organization, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product for a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible value while also securing a competitive advantage in your market. I look forward to discussing how this product can be a game-changer for your company.", "product_price": 1200000}
